record.dc:title: 118BY13 Ledford Island, Bradley County, Tennessee. Burial 16BY16 with bowl with effigy faces (F.S. 474), pot (F.S. 475) and shell spoon (F.S. 476) inside the bowl. Skull of 16BY18 shows in right foreground. Square 0R5. Direction South.
record.wpa:narrative: Indeterminate infant in fair condition, extended on back with head to west. Pit from plowzone filled with dark humic earth. Pit was intrusive to burial to south, probably intrusive to burial 16BY18 to northeast. Left leg partly flexed. Skull disturbed and lay against extreme west end of pit, mandible in place. Pots and spoon about 0.3 above left arm at side of pit.
